subject: fix bounded drag calculation
header: fix: fix bounded drag calculation
body:
To get the correct x/y coordinates the drag logic needs a reference to
the root <g> node that contains all the elements.

subject: ch5349, ch5736 & ch4155:
body:
- 5349: For Graphing items, move the origin label
- 5736: In Graphing, the horizontal alignment of multi-digit numeric labels for the x-axis is off
- 4155: Graphing item that wasn't supposed to have an x-axis or a y-axis still has them.

subject: Graphing issues and inconsistencies PD-123
header: fix: Graphing issues and inconsistencies PD-123
footer: BREAKING CHANGE: tools, currentTool, defaultTool and hideLabel should not be used as params anymore, instead, send only toolbarTools, which is an array of strings, where each string should be a valid tool type. eg. ['point', 'line', 'label']

notes.title: BREAKING CHANGE
notes.text: tools, currentTool, defaultTool and hideLabel should not be used as params anymore, instead, send only toolbarTools, which is an array of strings, where each string should be a valid tool type. eg. ['point', 'line', 'label']
